<h2>Habitat</h2>

In British Columbia, restricted to south-facing, conglomerate rock outcrops in the southern Gulf Islands. Also widespread in California, and known from one locality in Oregon, where it occurs on rock, outcrops, calcareous and volcanic boulders, fields, cliffs, runoff areas.
